creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: triangular, with stiff outer frame; pink tassels with black and white beads at top; triangular piece of blue fabric with red applique at bottom and white, maroon and blue cross-stitch
dimension: 12 x 15 3/8 x 3/4 in. (30.48 x 39.05 x 1.91 cm) (without tassels or ties)
title: Shaman's Hat
